name: LABE
description: LABE is a benchmark for evaluating language agency-related social biases in LLM-generations. The benchmark consists of (1) a Language Agency Classification (LAC) dataset with train, test, validation splits, and (2) a collection of template and descriptor-based prompts to query LLMs for different text generation tasks. For more information, please refer to our GitHub page.

affiliation.name: Department of Computer Science, University of California, Los Angeles
Department of Computer Science, University of California, Los Angeles
